subject: Re: [junit] Servlet testing...
msgSnippet: ... Our servlets are an entry point into our main code, like main() is an entry point into applications. We use JUnit to unit test the code behind the
messageBody:
"Bernal, Marco" <mbernal@...> wrote:
> Hi all, My name is Marco and I'm starting with
> JUnit.
>
> Has any of you used Junit to test Servlets...?

Our servlets are an entry point into our main code, like main() is an entry
point into applications. We use JUnit to unit test the code behind the
servlets, but not the servlets themselves.

We use HttpUnit <http://httpunit.sourceforge.net/> to do acceptance
(functional) tests on our servlets. It acts as an HTTP client and we can
have it click on links, get information from table cells, etc.


Erik
